content.title: Banding and Plication
content.description: Techniques to reduce access flow for high-flow complications

key_concepts.details: High-flow state with steal, high-output heart failure, aneurysmal degeneration
External band to reduce fistula diameter; PTFE, mesh, or external ligature
Suture plication to narrow the outflow vein lumen; alternative to banding
Reduce flow to 400-600 mL/min while maintaining fistula function

content.clinical_significance: Alternative to access ligation for flow-related complications

primary_sources: Chemla E et al. Semin Dial 2015
